doc:
Barry Gordon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Barry_Gordon 0 Barry Gordon (born December 21, 1948) is an American film, television and voice actor, and political talk show host and producer. He was the longest-serving president of the Screen Actors Guild, having served from 1988 to 1995. Barry_Gordon ( born December_21_,_1948 ) is an_American_film_,_television_and_voice_actor , and political_talk_show_host_and_producer . He was the_longest-serving_president of the_Screen_Actors_Guild , having_served from 1988 to 1995 .
